## CRAN Packages

The below packages use extendr and are currently (as of `r format(Sys.Date())`) published on CRAN. 

```{r message=FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
readr::read_csv("cran-pkgs.csv") |> 
    dplyr::mutate(Description = stringr::str_squish(Description)) |> 
    dplyr::filter(Package != "Polars") |> 
    dplyr::arrange(Package) |> 
    knitr::kable("simple")
```
